meanings.definition: The action of carrying something on or forward.
meanings.sent1: The continuations of the story kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent2: She pressed the button for continuations of the movie.
meanings.sent3: The continuations of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His continuations of the melody filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The continuations of the dance routine were flawless.

meanings.definition: The act or state of continuing.
meanings.sent1: The continuations of the meeting were scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent2: The continuations of the project were discussed in detail.
meanings.sent3: The continuations of the game were full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: The continuations of the road led to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The continuations of the story left the audience wanting more.
